title: Bolt layoffs, DroneUp, Lunar Outpost, $4.5B crypto fund, Ape theft + Diagramâ€™s Jordan Singer | E1471
description: In today's episode, Jason and Molly cover Bolt's layoffs (12:11), Walmart's drone deliveries (17:02), Lunar Outpost's $12M seed (32:31), a16z's $4.5B crypto raise (44:07), and Seth Green's Bored Ape heist (54:40). Producer Rachel sits down with Jordan Singer, founder of Diagram, for this week's OK Boomer (1:03:54).
